attributes.action: introduce strict immigration controls immediately and close the floodgates now
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government needs to recognise that a major immigration crisis is unfolding before its eyes. There is a tide of economic migration flooding in and the country is breaking under the strain and many with a profession who can are fed up paying astronomical taxes of every kind to fund the ridiculous spiralling cost of the welfare state. 

Our Hospitals are FULL. All The Prisons are full.  The roads are congested.  There is a water shortage, a housing shortage, etc etc.

The local Schools (especially single sex and faith schools) are struggling on a tide of non-English speaking children who appear almost on a daily basis. 

It is time for the Government to close the doors and introduce strict controls.  and to ignore the ignorant race-hate hysteria of the very few who would disagree with the policy.

How can it be a bad idea to be careful whom you allow  to come and settle in your country?
